title_popup_after_login: [Important] Notice on LMS Reflection Period for Course Registration Changes
announcement_one: To enhance lecture satisfaction through increased interaction between professors and students, we are conducting 'Student Suggestion Week' to gather student opinions on class operations at the beginning of the semester.
announcement_two: We encourage active participation to make this semester's classes more beneficial through free suggestions and recommendations on the courses attended during Student Suggestion Week.
announcement_three: Target courses: All courses offered in undergraduate and graduate programs (general/professional/specialized)
announcement_four: Excluding individual research, field training, and military science courses
announcement_six: Participation method: Dashboard/Course > CTL (Teaching and Learning Center) > Assignment (Survey): 2023 Second Semester Course Evaluation
